name: Bandi
content:
Bandi was a Ewok male who was affiliated with the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War against the Galactic Empire. He stood one meter tall and was skilled in dodging, hiding, sneaking, climbing, jumping, survival, and in the use of bows and melee weapons. He wore an animal skull as headgear and carried a spear, a bow, a flute, and leather pouches.
Bandi was created for the Rebel Characters Adventure Set, a boxed set of metal miniatures released in 1989 by West End Games to be used with Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. Bandi's character type was listed as just "Ewok" and his model came unpainted.
